attributes.action: To order an urgent re-run of the recent E.U referendum result.
attributes.additional_details:
Copy the following links to your browser window. These clearly show that both the Leave and Farage campaigns intentionally misled Brexit signatories by telling them this lie. Indeed both campaign groups were told to stop using this advert. Neither did, further compounding their deceit.

http://www.express.co.uk/news/uk/682979/Nigel-Farage-NHS 

http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/nigel-farage-admits-wont-extra-8271594
attributes.background: The Brexit leaders are now, when questioned about their promises, hastily retracting their said promises. This means that their victory was obtained on a totally fraudulent basis and should therefore be ruled as being invalid and arguably illegal.
